Plot spectra from dataframe

Source: R/FCMm.R
plot_spec_from_df.Rd

Spectra plot for a dataframe given numeric colnames

plot_spec_from_df(df)

Arguments

df

Data.frame for Rrs plotting

Value

The result of plot_spec_from_df is a ggplot object showing spectra curve.

Note

The colnames of input `df` should be numericalize.

See also

plot_spec_group

Other Fuzzy cluster functions: FCM.new(), FuzzifierDetermination(), apply_FCM_m(), apply_to_image(), cal_memb(), generate_param()

Examples

data(WaterSpec35)
plot_spec_from_df(WaterSpec35[, -c(1, 2)])

# which is equal to 
plot_spec_from_df(WaterSpec35)

#> Warning: Following columns are ignored as their names cannot be converted to numeric:
#> SampleID Chla
